directions: Pour enough spring water over Brazil nuts in a bowl to cover by several inches; soak in refrigerator 8 hours to overnight.

Drain Brazil nuts and put them into a blender; add banana, kefir, amaranth, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, and honey. Blend mixture until smooth, adding spring water as needed to reach desired consistency.
ingredients: 1 frozen banana, cut into small chunks
title: Banana and Brazil Nut Breakfast Smoothie
